metadata.name: Serra da Estrela | House
metadata.description:
A house in the mountains amidst fog can be described as a mysterious and enchanting place, where nature envelops everything in a veil of mist. The dense fog covers the landscape, reducing visibility and creating an atmosphere of mystery and calm.

The house can be made of wood or stone, with steep roofs to protect against rain and snow. The windows may be decorated with white lace curtains or left open to let in the light and fresh mountain breeze.

The interior of the house can be cozy, with lit fireplaces and warm blankets spread over the sofa and armchairs. The furniture may be rustic, with solid wooden chairs and dining tables, and the walls may be decorated with paintings of mountain landscapes or colorful tapestries.

Outside, the landscape may be mountainous, with wooded hills and fog-covered valleys. The sounds of nature can be heard in the distance, with the wind whispering through the trees and the distant sound of a creek or waterfall.
